Items.Title: Application No. 20175151 TCM pursuant to Section 20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of 26th Street Hospitality Group LLC,, d/b/a Bread & Tulips, for a revocable consent to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 365 Park Avenue S, Borough of Manhattan, Community Board 5, Council District 2.
